titles: The history of the life and actions of that great captain of his age the Viscount de Turenne written in French by Monsieur du Buisson, eldest captain & major of the regiment de Verdelin ; and translated into English by Ferrand Spence.
Vie du vicomte de Turenne. English
author: Courtilz de Sandras, Gatien, 1644-1712.
Spence, Ferrand.
publisher: Printed by J.B. for Dorman Newman & R. Bentley ...,
notes: This item appears at reels 888:28 and 1306:11.
Wing number D2414 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in the British Museum and the Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Gatien de Courtilz. cf. NUC pre-1956.
keywords: Turenne, Henri de La Tour d'Auvergne, --  vicomte de, 1611-1675.
